name: Channel Timezone
short: Adds a timezone for a discord text channel where it sends a message for the current time in the given timezone and updates that message every :30 and :00 minutes
description: This cog adds a timezone for a discord text channel where it sends a message for the current time in the given timezone and updates that message every :30 and :00 minutes
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store user data persistently
install_msg:
Thanks for installing Channel Timezone!
Please report any bugs/log output in *#support_other-cogs* on the cog support server (https://discord.gg/GET4DVk).
author: crayyy_zee
